segment.source: Learn how to catch AdControl errors in your app.
segment.target: Learn how to catch AdControl errors in your app.

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This topic demonstrates how to catch AdControl errors in your app.
segment.target: This topic demonstrates how to catch AdControl errors in your app.

segment.source: These examples assume that you have a JavaScript/HTML app that contains an AdControl.
segment.target: These examples assume that you have a JavaScript/HTML app that contains an AdControl.

segment.source: For step-by-step instructions that demonstrate how to add an AdControl to your app, see AdControl in HTML 5 and Javascript.
segment.target: For step-by-step instructions that demonstrate how to add an AdControl to your app, see AdControl in HTML 5 and Javascript.

segment.source: For a complete sample project that demonstrates how to add banner ads to a JavaScript/HTML app, see the advertising samples on GitHub.
segment.target: For a complete sample project that demonstrates how to add banner ads to a JavaScript/HTML app, see the advertising samples on GitHub.

segment.source: In the default.html file, add a value for the onErrorOccurred event where you define the data-win-options in the div for the AdControl.
segment.target: In the default.html file, add a value for the onErrorOccurred event where you define the data-win-options in the div for the AdControl.

segment.source: Find the following code in the default.html file.
segment.target: Find the following code in the default.html file.

segment.source: Following the adUnitId, add the value for the onErrorOccurred event.
segment.target: Following the adUnitId, add the value for the onErrorOccurred event.

segment.source: Here is the complete code for the div.
segment.target: Here is the complete code for the div.

segment.source: Create a div that will display text so you can see the messages being generated.
segment.target: Create a div that will display text so you can see the messages being generated.

segment.source: To do this, add the following code after the div for myAd.
segment.target: To do this, add the following code after the div for myAd.

segment.source: Create an AdControl that will trigger an error event.
segment.target: Create an AdControl that will trigger an error event.

segment.source: There can only be one application id for all AdControl objects in an app.
segment.target: There can only be one application id for all AdControl objects in an app.

segment.source: So creating an additional one with a different application id will trigger an error at runtime.
segment.target: So creating an additional one with a different application id will trigger an error at runtime.

segment.source: To do this, after the previous div sections you have added, add the following code to the body of the default.html page.
segment.target: To do this, after the previous div sections you have added, add the following code to the body of the default.html page.

segment.source: In the project’s default.js file, after the default initialization function, you will add the event handler for errorLogger.
segment.target: In the project’s default.js file, after the default initialization function, you will add the event handler for errorLogger.

segment.source: Scroll to the end of the file and after the last semi-colon is where you will put the following code.
segment.target: Scroll to the end of the file and after the last semi-colon is where you will put the following code.

segment.source: Build and run the file.
segment.target: Build and run the file.

segment.source: You will see the original ad from the sample app you built previously and text under that ad describing the error.
segment.target: You will see the original ad from the sample app you built previously and text under that ad describing the error.

segment.source: You will not see the ad with the id of liveAd.
segment.target: You will not see the ad with the id of liveAd.
